example.name: intransitive, arg1
example.text: He hesitated for a moment when Michelangelo asked him-1 [*-1] to disrobe[*T*-2] , so Michelangelo gave him a piece of toweling [0] [*] to wrap [*T*-3]around his loins , led him to the kitchen [*] to take off his clothes .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'disrobe' based on sentences in BROWN. Comparison to 'dress'. Entry in VN class dress-41.1.1
